message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You wanted 50/50, I'll give you a bit less, but still a good deal!
You're being a bit greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
You're getting desperate, I'm giving you a smaller share, but it's still a good deal!
You're not being very generous, Bob! I'll give you a slightly bigger share this time.
You're getting close to desperation, I'm giving you a huge share, but I'm not getting nothing!
You're being a bit more generous, Bob, but I still want a better deal. I'll give you a slightly smaller share this time.
You're running out of time, I'm giving you a tiny share, but I'm still getting most of it!
You're being really stingy now, Bob. I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're getting close to losing everything, I'm giving you a tiny share, but I'm not giving up!
You're really squeezing me now, Bob. I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're out of time, Alice. I'm taking almost everything. Don't bother trying to negotiate, it's too late!
